branchCategory.name: 90-SV2000/4000, Single Valve, Subplate Type, IP67 Compliant
branchCategory.description: <p>The SV series employs a multi-connector instead of the conventional lead wires for internal manifold wiring. By connecting each block with a connector, changes to manifold stations are greatly simplified. Cassette base type manifolds offer the ultimate in flexibility. Manifold sections can be added using a simple release mechanism. Conventional tie-rod base type manifolds are also available. The use of 34 pin connectors allows up to 16 stations with double solenoids.</p>

breadCrumb.name: 90-SV2000/4000, Single Valve, Subplate Type, IP67 Compliant
